summary: This mod adds chainmail for all types of metal alloys in the game, I never liked some models helm that looked like a Power Ranger, like ebony and Dwemer so I created an option to Chainmail, they can be manufactured in their respective materials and with appropriate perks, all can be improved and are balanced to avoid disturbing the balance of the g
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/3176/73vk.jpg[/img]

[size=4]LC_ Immersive chainmail ( my apologies by my english)[/size]

This mod adds chainmail for all types of metal alloys in the game, I never liked some models helm that looked like a Power Ranger, like ebony and Dwemer so I created an option to Chainmail, they can be manufactured in their respective materials and with appropriate perks, all can be improved and are balanced to avoid disturbing the balance of the game, having the same defense helm of each armor, it does not replace any model helm. Simply gives you the option of choice.

supports all races less Khajiit, I try adapt in a future update.



[size=4]Ask for Help[/size]

I am working on my new project called “Become Jarl of Ivarstead” and I need more Voice Actors to help me. They must have English as their native language and not be afraid of working hard!


If you just wanna offer your work and in the first request you disappear, Please don’t waste my time, if you wanna help don’t be messing around.
If you REALLY wanna help me with the project please contact me via private message Locaster
You can find pictures of the project on the Facebook Fan Page below:

[url=http://www.facebook.com/plugins/likebox.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fpages%2FBecome-King-of-Riverhelm-and-Locaster-mods%2F123193281131815&width=700&height=800&colorscheme=light&show_faces=true&header=true&stream=false&show_border=true][IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img560/1033/tj6n.png[/IMG][/url]
